'''"Special Report"''' is a [[Quest Item]] which can be obtained by speaking to [[Chronie]] at [[Café Lutece]] after completing the {{Quest|Fontaine Research Institute Chronicles}}. Obtaining it awards the {{Achievement|Solitary Report}}.

==Text==
On the Truths Hidden by the Fontaine Research Institute
<gallery>
Special Report Photograph Male.png|Aether version
Special Report Photograph Female.png|Lumine version
</gallery>
...Aftering{{sic}} personally conducting a series of on-site interviews, I have uncovered the full story of the first explosion at the Fontaine Research Institute, as well as all of the facts surrounding the second explosion. It all stemmed from the Institute's attempts to conceal an immense threat so large as to threaten the safety of the entire Court of Fontaine, namely, that the ruins of the Central Laboratory remain unsafe and have not been rendered harmless, and that the location contains hazards such as out-of-control meka constructions, vast amounts of out-of-control Arkhium, and an instrument that could release high-energy pulses at any moment, among other highly hazardous elements.<br>
Furthermore, when the Institute employed personnel to deal with the problem, operational errors caused the Laboratory ruins to explode a second time, resulting in the accidental death of at least one researcher.<br>
It is understood this researcher is named [[Nacker]], and was previously a senior researcher in [[Edwin Eastinghouse]]'s Arkhium research group. He had been deliberately sidelined by the Institute after the first explosion...
